ovdesc.p: This ‘U’ type table contains the definition of all UNIFI (ISO 20022) XML tags and sequences contains in any SEPA message. It also gives the default occurrence for any standard message.
If a single tag element and a sequence of tags to which it belongs have the same UNIFI Id, one of them must have a key with an additional suffix and a dot as separator (e.g.: Amt.1 and Amt).

To be considered as an element worth to be extracted from an inward SEPA XML message or to be generated onto an outward SEPA XML message, a TAG should passed successfully the test set up in at least one of the multi-values fields 8 to 11. For this, a ‘Y’ should be present in the USED.BY.SEPA field and the characteristics of the message should match the ones given at the 3 following fields (a blank being considered as a valid match).
The present table is thus the only one to be touched to allow a tag to be used or not in application.

The following table is used to extract the Tags depending on the above set up and to build up the complete message model for any combination of nature, entities and purpose. Any further update of the UNIFI.XML.TAG fields 8 to 11 will automatically adjust the content of the existing related records of the following UNIFI.XML.MESSAGE table and related SEPA.LAYOUT.

desc.p: This field specifies the Message purpose concerned by USED.FOR.SEPA.
Value upto 3 AND User can input only values 'CXL' or 'ORI' or 'REF' or 'REJ' or 'RET' or 'REV'
Associated multi value set of field USED.BY.SEPA
This field specifies the Sender and receiver related to USED.FOR.SEPA.
BB: Bank to Bank, CB: Customer to Bank,
Value upto 2 and User can input only values 'BB' or 'CB' or 'BC'
Associated multi value set of field USED.BY.SEPA
This field specifies the Name of the Tag
This Filed is Defaulted iwth the Vlaues 'Y' or 'NO'
‘Y’: considered if message matches the 3 next fields.
‘NO’: never considered if 3 next fields are matched
Value upto 2 and User can input only value 'Y' or 'NO'
This fields contains the Description of the Tag
Mandatory field and Individual Multi Value field
This field holds the Key to UNIFI.XML.FORMAT, format of theTag.
Value should exist in UNIFI.XML.FORMAT Application
This field specifies the Tags or sequence belonging to the group.
Multi Value Set and Value should exist in UNIFI.XML.TAG Application
This field specifies the Sequences to which this tag belongs (no input).
NOINPUT field and Value should exist in UNIFI.XML.TAG Application
This Field contains Any string of character. If duplicated on 2 or more tags, they are considered as mutually exclusive.
Multi Value Set and Value should exist in UNIFI.XML.TAG Application
This field contains the Key to the UNIFI.XML.MESSAGE giving the Id of the messages that owns this sequence (no input).
This field contains the Key to SEPA.NATURE related to USED.FOR.SEPA.
DD: Direct debit, CT: Credit Transfer
Value should exist in SEPA.NATURE Application
Associated multi value set of field USED.BY.SEPA
This field specifies the Occurrence number by default for the Tag.
n.M : Occurs at least M times
N.0 : Up to N occurrences or none.
N.M : Occurs between M and N times.
This field is defaulted with the Override message generated for this application
